**Longbows** are an upgrade over [shortbows](/Shortbow "Shortbow") and [orcbows](/Orcbow "Orcbow"), dealing more damage. They fire faster than [arbalests](/Arbalest "Arbalest").

## Strategy

Longbows are one of the stronger weapons for a ranged weapons user. At around 16 skill (or higher), a longbow will outdamage an [arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") against a 0 AC target. An arbalest can still be better if it has higher enchantment, but the base delay introduces [risks in combat](/Heavy#Risks_of_.3E1.0_attack_delay "Heavy").

Of course, a [triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow") is more powerful, but it's rarer and requires more skill to reach mindelay.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), longbows had 13 damage and 16 base delay. Also, it was significantly more likely to find a longbow in the early-mid game (as [centaur warriors](/Centaur_warrior "Centaur warrior") could have them.)
- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), longbows had 12 damage, 17 base delay, and a mindelay of 6.
- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), longbows had their damage and mindelay reduced (previously 15 damage, 7 mindelay) . They were affected by the [ranged weapons rework](/Ranged_Weapons#History "Ranged Weapons") that applied to all launchers, including the removal of the dedicated [bows skill](/Bows_\(skill\) "Bows (skill)") and [arrow](/Arrow "Arrow") requirement.
- Longbows were introduced in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15").

Upon the grounde he lay full still."

Longbows are an upgrade over shortbows and orcbows, dealing more damage. They fire faster than arbalests.

Strategy

Longbows are one of the stronger weapons for a ranged weapons user. At around 16 skill (or higher), a longbow will outdamage an arbalest against a 0 AC target. An arbalest can still be better if it has higher enchantment, but the base delay introduces risks in combat.
